desc.cn: Kubevela 是一个现代的软件交付平台，它使当今混合，多云环境中的部署和操作应用程序更容易，更快，更可靠
desc.en: KubeVela is a modern software delivery platform that makes deploying and operating applications across today's hybrid, multi-cloud environments easier, faster and more reliable

linux/curl.cmd:
curl -fsSl https://kubevela.io/script/install-velad.sh | bash \
&& velad install \
&& export KUBECONFIG=$(velad kubeconfig --host) \
&& vela comp

darwin/curl.cmd:
curl -fsSl https://kubevela.io/script/install-velad.sh | bash \
&& velad install \
&& export KUBECONFIG=$(velad kubeconfig --host) \
&& vela comp

win/powershell.cmd:
powershell -Command "iwr -useb https://static.kubevela.net/script/install-velad.ps1 | iex" \
&& velad install \
&& $env:PATH += ";$HOME\.vela\bin;" \
&& $env:KUBECONFIG = $(velad kubeconfig --host) \
&& vela comp
